title: Ticket #6375: delegate_job_gsi_credentials_lifetime=0 in submit file is broken
description: Setting delegate_job_gsi_credentials_lifetime=0 in the submit description file should result in the delegated proxy having the same lifetime as the source proxy (just like config param DELEGATE_JOB_GSI_CREDENTIALS_LIFETIME). Instead, it acts like the attribute isn't set.
check_ins:
2017-Aug-14 15:15   Check-in [52096]: Docs for delegate_job_gsi_credentials_lifetime=0 bug fix. #6375 (By Jaime Frey )
2017-Aug-14 15:11   Check-in [52095]: Can now specify full-length proxy delegation in submit file. #6375 Setting delegate_job_gsi_credentials_lifetime=0 in the submit file now results in a delegated proxy with a lifetime equal to the source credential, as documented. Previously, it was treated the same as not setting the attribute. (By Jaime Frey )
